Reviews.Content: hi iran villa hotel nine nights 10 19 oct 2011 clean refurbished items include floor covering painting curtains double bed standard floor managers friendly bath inside clean spacious hotel location excellent saint catherine str popular streets montreal equipped coffee maker excellent recommend economical hotel strongly
